description: Adapted from CIM and https://github.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.EnergyCIM/ data models: a MV customer is a CustomerLoad

contents.name: p
contents.description: Active power of the load. Load sign convention is used, i.e. positive sign means flow out from a node. For voltage dependent loads the value is at rated voltage. Starting value for a steady state solution. Default: 0.0

contents.name: pfixed
contents.description: Active power of the load that is a fixed quantity. Load sign convention is used, i.e. positive sign means flow out from a node. Default: 0.0

contents.name: q
contents.description: Reactive power of the load. Load sign convention is used, i.e. positive sign means flow out from a node. For voltage dependent loads the value is at rated voltage. Starting value for a steady state solution. Default: 0.0

contents.name: qfixed
contents.description: Reactive power of the load that is a fixed quantity. Load sign convention is used, i.e. positive sign means flow out from a node. Default: 0.0
